Nick's Blog

LibraryThing

25 February 2006

I have about 200+ feeds in NetNewsWire that I dig through every 6 hours or so. If you add it all up, it probably amounts to reading 2 books a week. I was reading Alex Barnett's blog and saw that he was pointing to LibraryThing.com.

Its a pretty cool site that lets you create an online catalog of the books you own. I think you can do the same thing with MTAmazon, but for the people who aren't using MovableType this might be the ticket.

Go try it out, look at how it works and then check out my small, but growing, collection.
